title: Ngai teh Pathian ni ropui chu
lyrics:
Ngai teh, Pathian ni ropui chu,
A lo thleng, kawl a lo eng;
Hringfa zawngte u, tho ula;
Lawm r'u, Varparh eng mawi chu.

Hnawl leh phatsan ni mah se,
Tihduhdah, khenbeh tuarin;
Thlan ata a tho leh ta,
A hmelma a hneh ta!
Tu nge a hming phat leh ang,
A chakna do ngam ang?
A hmaah kunin kan rawn bia,
Lalber chu khumtirin.

Krista ring r'u, in hruaitu chu,
In thinlung thlaphan bo se;
Sipai rual Isuan a hruai a,
A hmingin an ngam ngei ang.

Hnehtu pawlho an puanzar phe,
An lo lian, hma an sawn zel;
'Lal Kristan leiah ro a rel,'
Tih hla ropui an rawn chhawn.
